wikipedia_page.main:
Charles "Chic" Gilchrist Brodie (born 8 May 1944) is a Scottish politician, who has been the leader of Scotia Future since 2020.
Brodie was previously a Scottish National Party (SNP) Member of the Scottish Parliament (MSP) for the South Scotland region from 2011 until 2016. Before joining the SNP in 2010, Brodie had been an active member of the Liberal Party and then the Liberal Democrats since the 1970s. He stood as a Liberal Democrat candidate at the 1992, 1997 and 2001 UK general elections, and as a Liberal at the general elections of October 1974, 1979, 1983 and 1987.

response: * Chic Brodie (politician) (born 1944), member of the Scottish Parliament, elected in 2011
